languages.text: "Это была часть скоординированной атаки, обрушившейся на весь Простор. Еретики явно долго готовились".
"This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have been preparing for a long time."
languages.original_text: "Это была часть скоординированной атаки, обрушившейся на весь Простор. Еретики явно долго готовились".

traits.locale_text: "This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have spent a lot of time on preparations."
"This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have spent a lot of time on preparations."
"This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have spent huge amounts time on preparations."
"This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have spent huge amounts time on preparations."
"This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have been preparing for a long time."
"This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have been preparing for a long time."

languages.text: “这是一场协同攻击，整个科罗努斯扩区都遭到了袭击。那些异端分子想必花了很长时间策划这场袭击。”
languages.original_text: "This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have been preparing for a long time."

traits.locale_text: “这是一场协同攻击，整个科罗努斯扩区都遭到了袭击。那些异端分子想必花了很长时间策划这场袭击。”

languages.text: «Esto fue parte de un ataque coordinado que afectó a toda la Extensión. Los herejes deben llevar mucho tiempo preparándolo».
languages.original_text: "This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have been preparing for a long time."

traits.locale_text: «Esto fue parte de un ataque coordinado que afectó a toda la Extensión. Los herejes deben llevar mucho tiempo preparándolo».

languages.text: 「これはエクスパンス全体を襲った組織的な攻撃の一環でした。異端者は準備に相当な時間を費やしたはずです」
languages.original_text: "This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have been preparing for a long time."

traits.locale_text: 「これはエクスパンス全体を襲った組織的な攻撃の一環でした。異端者は準備に相当な時間を費やしたはずです」
「これはエクスパンス全体を襲った組織的な攻撃の一環でした。異端者は準備に相当な時間を費やしたはずです」

languages.text: « Cela faisait partie d'une attaque coordonnée déclenchée aux quatre coins des Étendues. Les hérétiques devaient la préparer depuis très longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have been preparing for a long time."

traits.locale_text: « Cela faisait partie d'une attaque coordonnée déclenchée aux quatre coins des Étendues. Les hérétiques devaient la préparer depuis très longtemps. »

languages.text: "Das war Teil eines koordinierten Angriffs auf die gesamte Ausdehnung. Die Ketzer müssen sich lange vorbereitet haben."
languages.original_text: "This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have been preparing for a long time."

traits.locale_text: "Das war Teil eines koordinierten Angriffs auf die gesamte Ausdehnung. Die Ketzer müssen sich lange vorbereitet haben."
"Das war Teil eines koordinierten Angriffs auf die gesamte Ausdehnung. Die Ketzer müssen das von langer Hand geplant und vorbereitet haben."

languages.text: "Tüm Enginlik'te gerçekleşen eş güdümlü bir saldırının parçasıydı bu. Kâfirler buna uzunca bir süre hazırlanmış olmalı."
languages.original_text: "This was a part of a coordinated attack that hit the entire Expanse. The heretics must have been preparing for a long time."
